ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Goblin Alchemist
ygData.msgSnippet: There are 3 spawn points, not 4 =) The one on the left by the rock and the one in the middle are both 6 minute spawns. The Alchemist spawn is very close to the
ygData.messageBody:
There are 3 spawn points, not 4 =)

The one on the left by the rock and the one in the middle are both 6 minute
spawns. The Alchemist spawn is very close to the middle spawn. This spawn
time ranges from 72-80 minutes. I have heard reports that the Beholder
Alchemist is level 19 consistently, however I cannot verify it as it was
green to me (lvl 37 at the time I did the quest).

Be prepared for the worst of camps. Personally, I spent 64+ hours waiting in
Beholder, and it finally arrived at the end of a 10 hour stretch. The key to
make him spawn seemed to be me saying "ok... one more placeholder then I
MUST sleep" *wink*

If you can manage to get the 2 6 minute spawns in a cycle, it is very easy
to tell when the ph spawn hits, as it will be in the middle of the canyon
and out of synch with the cycle. In all my hours camping, there was always a
ph spawn, it was never skipped.

Hmmm what else...

If I think of anything else that will help, I'll shoot everyone another
note.

Good luck!!

Praelor Dileasai
Monk of Fennin Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: RaceFace [mailto:bean@...]
Sent: Tuesday, March 21, 2000 2:22 PM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Goblin Alchemist

From: "RaceFace" <bean@...>


Goblin sentries spawn regularly there, along with lookouts
and veterans.

I'd also heard that "nothing" was also a placeholder for
him.

> From: David Frascone <chaos@...>
>
>
> There's another strange goblin spawn that is his place
holder. It's not
> one of the normal three, he is just near him. I forgot
it's name, but
> I think it's Goblin Sentry or somethign like that.
>
> On Tue, Mar 21, 2000 at 03:15:06PM -0600, RaceFace wrote:
> > From: "RaceFace" <bean@...>
> >
> > I don't think he has placeholders.
> >
> > I think there's a 4th spawn point.
> >
> > When I arrived in the zone, all 3 of the spawn points
had goblins at
them.
> > I didn't kill any, went to the bathroom, came back, and
the alchemist
had
> > just started walking away from his spawn point. Unless
one of them
> > despawned, and the alchemist appeared, there's a 4th,
separate spawn for
> > him.

think. I would

> > > the alchy will be in the high teens or very low
twenties.

> > >
> > > Good luck,
> > >
> > > Thors Blazingfury, Tunare
